item.title: Run Ncurses Over Raw Serial Port
item.description: Introduction I previously wrote how to configure miniicom to connect to a device over serial UART. In that post I mentioned that Minicom might not be the best tool for the job. Consider that minicom is adding a lot of unecessary complexity. If you think about it, we are taking a command line utility intended for communicating with modems, stripping all that functionality away so that we are left with nothing more than a terminal emulator that knows how to connect to a foreign tty.
